Annual Membership Options

As a grassroots nonprofit, we rely on membership support to keep the doors open, lights on, and programming affordable. Here are a variety of ways to join and support!

Class Pass Membership

A 12 month payment plan $39 per 12 months Benefits: Your choice of 3 classes for the year 20% off classes and products Borrow 8 tools a week Free open shop hours

Class Pass Membership

A 12 month payment plan $29 per 12 months Benefits: Your choice of 2 classes for the year 10% off classes and products Borrow 8 tools a week Free open shop hours

Class Pass Membership

A 12 month payment plan $19 per 12 months Benefits: Your choice of 1 class for the year 10% off classes and products Borrow 8 tools a week Free open shop hours

Class Pass Membership

A 12 month payment plan for classes and library membership $9 per 12 months Benefits: Shop Safety I Class Credit 10% off classes and products Borrow 8 tools a week Free open shop hours

Class Pass Membership

One time payment $1/$1,000 annual income Benefits: Borrow 8 tools a week Free open shop hours after completion of Shop Safety I
